msContents.summary: This manuscript seems to contain the commentary of Nārāyaṇa. The beginning is in Sanskrit, but the completion statement is in Tamil, indicating that this manuscript contains the first two kāṇḍas.

msItem.rubric:
śuklāṃbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ cakarśajaṃ - prasannavadanaṃdhyāyet sarvavighno
paśāntaye - |
msItem.incipit:
kleśādayo yaṃ na parāmṛśaṃti yo vā bibharttiśvaraśabdam ekaḥ | purā
tanānānāṃ gurave gurūṇāṃ tasmai namo nāgavibhūṣaṇāya | āyurdhanarvveda
nighaṇṭusāraṃ smṛtiḥ purāṇaṃ nikhilaṃ sahasraśaḥ |samīkṣya vakṣye mara
kośapañcikāṃ vyutpatsavas tāṃ pariśīlayas tu ko marttyo marakośas tu
vivarītuṃ kṣamo bhuvi ko vābdhīmathanaṃ karttuṃ śakto nārāyaṇādṛte
tatra ye svena vivṛtā ye ca vyaktārtthavācinaḥ | teṣān nirartthakā vyākhyā vyākriyante
tu durgamāḥ |

gurutvād eva tannāma nokta
vān - yasyeti | vāyudaivatasya yakārasyādau nirddeśaś śīghrasamāptyartthaḥ |
yasya jñeti magaṇasya gurutrayātmakasyādau nirddeśaḥ sthairyyādisiddhya
rtthaṃ - jñānadayāsindhor ity ādi viśeṣaṇadvayaṃ phaladvayāvekṣayā | ayaṃ bhāvaḥ |
mokṣe dhī jñānam anyatra vijñānaṃ śilpiśāstrayor iti vakṣyati · vararuciś ca pravṛttam a
pavargāya jñānam ity ucyate budhaiḥ | vijñānam anyaśāstreṣu kalāsu ca pariśramaḥ
iti jñānasindhutvād amṛtāya sevyatāṃ - dayāsindhutvāc śriyai bhuktaye se
vyatām iti - sindhusāmyam āha - agādhasya avāṅ_manasagocarasya anyatrāta
laspṛśyasyānaghāḥ guṇāḥ smaraṇakīrttanādibhiḥ aghavirodhinaḥ anyatra snānā
dibhiḥ - akṣayaḥ nāśarahitaḥ anyatra asya viṣṇoḥ kṣayo vāso vāsadeśa ity artthaḥ |
gaṃbhīrāḥ guṇāḥ | dhiyaṃ prayacśantīti dhīrāḥ | rā dāne - āto nupasarge kaḥ | athavā dhī
rāḥ vidvāṃsaḥ | bhavat_bhis sevyatām iti - śriyai amṛtāya ca - jñānaiś caryyādyabhi
vṛddhyartthaṃ - yathā sindhum āśritya devāś śrīyam amṛtañ cāpnuvan - evam asāv api |
